original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1161)@</color>在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4434)@</color> 秒內提升我方全體武將 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4434)@</color> 點武力和智力以及 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_MS(4434)@</color> 點移動速度，同時提升我方全體士兵 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4439)@</color> 點武力 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_MS(4439)@</color> 點移動速度，若士兵內有騎兵的話則額外提升 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4454)@</color> 點武力 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_MS(4454)@</color> 點移動速度，且 <color=#ccffcc>4</color> 秒為間隔以  <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(876)@ x2</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>隨機對敵方武將周圍造成 <color=#ccffcc>7</color> 次物理傷害。
